name: AstRunOut
description:
AstRunOut

This is my first game i uploaded.  This game is for Beginners Game Jam. I make it solo because i wanna try it. Some asset on this game is free asset from internet, i'll put the link below.

Astrunout is an endless run game where the player must shooting an alien to survive. The difficulty is increases during the playtime.  Player must avoid every shoot from the alien.

Have fun ;)
